text:
The father of one of the three youths arrested for alleged IS links claimed that his son was “innocent” and had gone abroad for a job to support his family.

“I am a poor man and have debt on me. My son went abroad to relieve us of the debt. He is innocent and has no connection with them [IS],” Abdul Sattar Sheikh, father of Sheikh Azhar-ul-Islam, said. — PTI
title: ‘My son has no connection with IS’
